  • Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme used by edu.biu.protocols.CommitmentWithZkProofOfDifference 
    Class and Description
    CmtCCommitmentMsg
    This interface represents the commitment message sent from the committer to the receiver during the commitment phase.
    CmtCDecommitmentMessage
    General interface for the decommitment message the committer sends to the receiver.
    CmtCommitter
    This the general interface of the Committer side of a Commitment Scheme.
